DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term that represents the kind of  neurological complication related to surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Widespread, broadly dispersed, common._A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery._Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure._Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Widespread, broadly dispersed, common.:A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.:Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.
Any disease or disorder that occurs during the course of, or because of, another disease, treatment, or procedure.

Property.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Princess Margaret as requested by D.Laurence. mc 6/15/16

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

PermissibleValues.value: Peripheral nerve injury (not including cranial nerves)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Sensory or motor loss of peripheral nerve function due to a traumatic event. (ACC)

Concepts.definition: Sensory or motor loss of peripheral nerve function due to a traumatic event. (ACC)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A sudden loss of neurological function secondary to hemorrhage or ischemia in the brain parenchyma due to a vascular event.

Concepts.definition: A sudden loss of neurological function secondary to hemorrhage or ischemia in the brain parenchyma due to a vascular event.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A brief attack (from a few minutes to an hour) of cerebral dysfunction of vascular origin, with no persistent neurological deficit.

Concepts.definition: A brief attack (from a few minutes to an hour) of cerebral dysfunction of vascular origin, with no persistent neurological deficit.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Sudden, involuntary skeletal muscular contractions of cerebral or brain stem origin.

Concepts.definition: Sudden, involuntary skeletal muscular contractions of cerebral or brain stem origin.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Relating to or occurring during the period immediately following a surgical operation.: A usually reversible condition characterized by the acute and sudden development of confusion, illusions, movement changes, inattentiveness, agitation, and hallucinations. Causes include drug abuse, poisoning, infectious processes, and fluid and electrolyte imbalance.

Concepts.definition: Relating to or occurring during the period immediately following a surgical operation.

A usually reversible condition characterized by the acute and sudden development of confusion, illusions, movement changes, inattentiveness, agitation, and hallucinations. Causes include drug abuse, poisoning, infectious processes, and fluid and electrolyte imbalance.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Be specific about something; define clearly.: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Situated or occurring within the cranium; affecting or involving intracranial structures.: An inflammatory process characterized by the accumulation of pus within a newly formed tissue cavity which is the result of a bacterial, fungal, or parasitic infection or the presence of a foreign body.

Concepts.definition: Situated or occurring within the cranium; affecting or involving intracranial structures.

An inflammatory process characterized by the accumulation of pus within a newly formed tissue cavity which is the result of a bacterial, fungal, or parasitic infection or the presence of a foreign body.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
